languages.text: "Поражение", {n}— горько говорит Арджента.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Авгуры{/g} корабля не обнаружили на планете ничего при орбитальном сканировании. Этого я, впрочем, ожидала — легенда гласила, что корабль умеет скрывать себя от глаз, и лишь паломник, ведомый сердцем, отыщет его".

traits.locale_text: "Поражение", {n}— горько говорит Арджента.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Авгуры{/g} корабля не обнаружили на планете ничего при орбитальном сканировании. Этого я, впрочем, ожидала — легенда гласила, что корабль умеет скрывать себя от глаз, и лишь паломник, ведомый сердцем, отыщет его".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Defeat," {n}Argenta says bitterly.{/n} "The ship's {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} failed to detect anything of note during orbital scanning. I was expecting this, though — according to the legend, the ship can conceal itself from the naked eye, and only a pilgrim guided by a pure heart can find it."
languages.original_text: "Поражение", {n}— горько говорит Арджента.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Авгуры{/g} корабля не обнаружили на планете ничего при орбитальном сканировании. Этого я, впрочем, ожидала — легенда гласила, что корабль умеет скрывать себя от глаз, и лишь паломник, ведомый сердцем, отыщет его".

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

I was expecting this, though — according to the legend, the ship can conceal itself from the naked eye, and only a pilgrim guided by a pure heart can find it."

I was expecting this, though — according to the legend, the ship can conceal itself from the naked eye, and only a pilgrim guided by a pure heart can find it."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我失败了。”{n}阿洁塔痛苦地说道。{/n}“飞船的{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}俄歇矩阵{/g}进行了轨道扫描，但没有发现任何值得留意的东西。不过，我早就料到了这一点。根据传说记载，这艘飞船无法用肉眼识别，只有被纯洁心灵所引导的朝圣者才能找到它的所在。”
languages.original_text: "Defeat," {n}Argenta says bitterly.{/n} "The ship's {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} failed to detect anything of note during orbital scanning. I was expecting this, though — according to the legend, the ship can conceal itself from the naked eye, and only a pilgrim guided by a pure heart can find it."

traits.locale_text: “我失败了。”{n}阿洁塔痛苦地说道。{/n}“飞船的{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}俄歇矩阵{/g}进行了轨道扫描，但没有发现任何值得留意的东西。不过，我早就料到了这一点。根据传说记载，这艘飞船无法用肉眼识别，只有被纯洁心灵所引导的朝圣者才能找到它的所在。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La derrota», {n}dice amargamente Argenta.{/n} «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} de la nave no lograron detectar nada durante los análisis orbitales. Pero eso ya me lo esperaba. Según las leyendas, la nave puede ocultarse a la vista y solo un peregrino de corazón puro podría encontrarla».
languages.original_text: "Defeat," {n}Argenta says bitterly.{/n} "The ship's {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} failed to detect anything of note during orbital scanning. I was expecting this, though — according to the legend, the ship can conceal itself from the naked eye, and only a pilgrim guided by a pure heart can find it."

traits.locale_text: «La derrota», {n}dice amargamente Argenta.{/n} «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} de la nave no lograron detectar nada durante los análisis orbitales. Pero eso ya me lo esperaba. Según las leyendas, la nave puede ocultarse a la vista y solo un peregrino de corazón puro podría encontrarla».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「負けだ」{n}アルジェンタは苦々しげに言う。{/n}「この船の{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}スキャナー{/g}は軌道スキャンで何も発見できなかった。こうなるだろうとは思っていましたが…伝説によれば、この船は肉眼からは姿を隠し、純粋な心に導かれた巡礼者だけが見つけることができるといいます」
languages.original_text: "Defeat," {n}Argenta says bitterly.{/n} "The ship's {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} failed to detect anything of note during orbital scanning. I was expecting this, though — according to the legend, the ship can conceal itself from the naked eye, and only a pilgrim guided by a pure heart can find it."

traits.locale_text: 「負けだ」{n}アルジェンタは苦々しげに言う。{/n}「この船の{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}スキャナー{/g}は軌道スキャンで何も発見できなかった。こうなるだろうとは思っていましたが…伝説によれば、この船は肉眼からは姿を隠し、純粋な心に導かれた巡礼者だけが見つけることができるといいます」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ein Debakel", {n}sagt Argenta verbittert.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Auguren{/g} des Schiffs konnten beim Scan aus dem Orbit nichts Bemerkenswertes feststellen. Das hatte ich allerdings erwartet – laut Legende bleibt das Schiff dem bloßen Auge verborgen, und nur Pilger reinen Herzens können es sehen."
languages.original_text: "Defeat," {n}Argenta says bitterly.{/n} "The ship's {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} failed to detect anything of note during orbital scanning. I was expecting this, though — according to the legend, the ship can conceal itself from the naked eye, and only a pilgrim guided by a pure heart can find it."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Debakel", {n}sagt Argenta verbittert.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Auguren{/g} des Schiffs konnten beim Scan aus dem Orbit nichts Bemerkenswertes feststellen. Das hatte ich allerdings erwartet – laut Legende bleibt das Schiff dem bloßen Auge verborgen, und nur Pilger reinen Herzens können es sehen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Un échec, {n}répond Argenta amèrement.{/n} Les {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} du vaisseau n'ont rien détecté de notable lors du scan orbital, mais je m'y attendais : d'après la légende, le vaisseau est capable de se dissimuler à l'œil nu et ne se révèle qu'à un pèlerin guidé par un cœur pur. »
languages.original_text: "Defeat," {n}Argenta says bitterly.{/n} "The ship's {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} failed to detect anything of note during orbital scanning. I was expecting this, though — according to the legend, the ship can conceal itself from the naked eye, and only a pilgrim guided by a pure heart can find it."

traits.locale_text: « Un échec, {n}répond Argenta amèrement.{/n} Les {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} du vaisseau n'ont rien détecté de notable lors du scan orbital, mais je m'y attendais : d'après la légende, le vaisseau est capable de se dissimuler à l'œil nu et ne se révèle qu'à un pèlerin guidé par un cœur pur. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Başarısız olduk." {n}Argenta burukça konuşuyor.{/n} "Geminin {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}alametleri{/g}, yörünge taraması esnasında kayda değer bir şey tespit edemedi. Ancak böyle olacağını tahmin ediyordum. Efsaneye göre gemi, çıplak gözle görülemiyor çünkü kendini gizleyebiliyor. Ancak saf yüreğinin rehberliğinde ilerleyen bir seyyah tarafından bulunabileceği söyleniyor."
languages.original_text: "Defeat," {n}Argenta says bitterly.{/n} "The ship's {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} failed to detect anything of note during orbital scanning. I was expecting this, though — according to the legend, the ship can conceal itself from the naked eye, and only a pilgrim guided by a pure heart can find it."

traits.locale_text: "Başarısız olduk." {n}Argenta burukça konuşuyor.{/n} "Geminin {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}alamet{/g}leri, yörünge taraması esnasında kayda değer bir şey tespit edilemedi. Ancak böyle olacağını tahmin ediyordum. Efsaneye göre gemi, çıplak gözle görülemiyor çünkü kendini gizleyebiliyor. Ancak saf yüreğinin rehberliğinde ilerleyen bir seyyah tarafından bulunabileceği söyleniyor."
